content.text:
# Draft:Magha Dynasty of Kaushambi

The Magha dynasty ruled the area of Kaushambi and Rewa during the later period of the Kushan empire from the 2nd century CE until the defeat of their last ruler Rudradeva by Gupta monarch Samudragupta in the 4th century CE. Many of its rulers bore the suffix -magha in their names.
References
